entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 2:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
